input: Which one of the following is the correct breakup of the composition of Lok Sabha Constituencies?

options.A: (b) (c) (d) Total Constituencies 545 543 543 545 General Constituencies 423 423 425 427 Schedule Caste 80 79 78 79 Constituencies Constituencies 42 41 40 39

explanation: Lok Sabha Constituencies Total Constituencies 543 General Constituencies 423 Schedule Caste 79 Constituencies Constituencies 41
